study.name: Cow liver cell analysis
study.description: Investigating cow livers (XA). Cow (bos taurus) livers are sometimes ingested by humans (homo sapiens). We investigate cow liver cells to determine flavor. Jean Chang, Eric Weitz, Jon Bistline, Eno-Abasi Augustine-Akpan, Devon Bush, Vicky Horst. Journal of SCP Synthetic Studies. Volume 1, p1, February 2020. Adding synthetic study data to development and staging environments has been shown to improve testability of new code. We extend those findings to the Single Cell Portal by adding this synthetic data.
